column4: what's the skill leverl of the person using the tool(s) and what kinda things do they need to do?
bash scripts with ssh allows one user to do anything, and if you set 'em with the right permissions, you can assure that's all they do.
but there's like webmin, but that may let the user(s) do too much.
are you good with bash? Would you be able to take a look at my script and tell me what is wrong? It's only 9 lines long.
